Class SSLContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.utils.SSLContextFactory

  • public final class SSLContextFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for creating SSLContext instance.

                                       throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Creates a SSLContext with specified keystore credential.
        Parameters:
        keyStoreCredential - the credential of the keystore.
        Returns:
        a SSLContext instance.
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - the general security exception

      • create

        public static javax.net.ssl.SSLContext create(java.lang.String keyStorePath,
                                              java.lang.String keyStorePassword,
                                              KeyStoreType keyStoreType)
                                       throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Creates a SSLContext object with specified keystore stream and password.
        Parameters:
        keyStorePath - the path of the keystore.
        keyStorePassword - the password of the keystore.
        keyStoreType - the type of the keystore.
        Returns:
        An SSLContext instance.
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - the general security exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
